name: Server Surfer
description:
This is for the Mini Jam 123

Theme: Web

Limitation: No Ground

Server Surfer is a simple bullet hell style shoot em up. Obviously there is no ground so the player is essentially flying since I couldn't get the gun physics to work. If you're curious how a web server applies to the theme its because I thought of the pun first and everything else after.

You are an i-con on a WEB server who's task it is to eliminate the virus that is destroying your company's data integrity! Its your job to scour the web for useful tools and exterminate anything that stands in your way.

Basic Controls:

WASD - Move

Lclick - Fire

Mouse-Aim

1|2|3-Switch Weapon

R|Delete|Backspace-Spawn a giant 2
